metadata.title: YouTube Audio Library Guide 2025: Free Music & Sound Effects
metadata.description: Master YouTube's free Audio Library. Find music, sound effects, and understand licensing for your videos.

hero.headline: YouTube Audio Library: Free Music for Your Videos
hero.subheadline: Thousands of free tracks and sound effects. No copyright claims, no cost.

sections.content: YouTube's Audio Library offers free music and sound effects for your videos. No copyright claims, no cost, no attribution required for most tracks. It's the safest option for YouTube content. Here's how to find and use it effectively.

content.title: Music Tracks
content.description: Thousands of songs across genres. Moods, instruments, and duration filters.

content.title: Sound Effects
content.description: Ambient sounds, transitions, actions. Organized by category.

content.title: Starred Favorites
content.description: Save tracks for later. Build your go-to collection.

sections.title: How to Access
content: Download and use in your videos

sections.title: Filtering Tips
content: Filter by mood for consistent feel

sections.title: Before Using Audio
content: Noted creator for attribution if needed?

faq.question: Is YouTube Audio Library really free?
faq.answer: Yes. Free for YouTube videos. Some tracks require attribution in description (marked clearly). No claims when used properly.

faq.question: Can I use Audio Library music elsewhere?
faq.answer: Check each track's license. Many are only for YouTube. Some allow broader use. When in doubt, use only on YouTube.

faq.question: Is the quality good enough?
faq.answer: Quality is decent but varies. Some tracks sound professional, others basic. For higher quality, consider paid services like Epidemic Sound.

faq.question: Why do some tracks require attribution?
faq.answer: Artist preference. Some creators allow free use with credit. Copy the attribution text exactly as shown. It's a small price for free music.
